articles.title: Kim Jong Il Issues Order on Raising Military Ranks
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Issues Order on Raising Military Ranks
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Wednesday issued Order No. 0045 on raising the military ranks of commanding officers of the KPA.
					 In the order he said that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK which President Kim Il Sung founded and led along the road of one victory after another have grown to be a matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu pervaded with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, fully displaying its might as a driving force of revolution in defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Expressing belief that the commanding officers of the KPA would in the future, too, firmly defend the security of the country and the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms and creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty as a driving force for the revolution, remaining true to the leadership of the Party, he ordered to raise their military ranks on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The order noted that the military rank of U Tong Chuk, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol and Jong Ho Gyun is promoted to general, that of Choe Kyong Song, Choe Sang Ryo, Han Chang Sun, Jon Chang Bok and O Chol San to colonel general, that of Ri Ju Hong, Kim Su Gil and six others to lieutenant general and that of Ham Ryong Chol, Son Kyong Bok and 81 others to major general.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends for the democratic national education of the children of Koreans in Japan to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. The fund and stipends amounted to 184,027,390 yen in Japanese currency.
					 The educational aid fund and stipends remitted by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Chongryon in 156 installments so far totaled 46,594 ,250,390 yen.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday.
					 Present there were senior Party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, leading officials of the Party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Also present were delegations of overseas compatriots, overseas Korean figures and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here were present there on invitation.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, delivered a report.
					
					 The reporter said that April 15 when President Kim Il Sung was born was the day of great fortune of the nation as the national resurrection dawned on the whole of Korea over which the dark clouds of national ruin had hung heavily and a significant historic day when a bright future was provided for the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					 The President was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea, a peerless patriot and an ever-victorious iron-willed commander who gave origin to the Songun revolution and led the cause of independence against imperialism to victory under the banner of the Juche idea, saving and glorifying the destiny of the country and the nation with arms and, at the same time, a peerless statesman who built the Juche-oriented party and state and achieved the unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks, thereby securing a powerful driving force for the revolution, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a genius of creation and construction and father of socialist Korea who glorified the Korean people's history of struggle for socialist construction as a history of the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge and built most advantageous socialism centered on the popular masses on this land, bringing about epoch-making changes in accomplishing the cause of building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The reporter referred to the fact that the President paved a wide avenue for achieving national reunification and made an undying contribution to the cause of global independence. 
					
					Thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the revolutionary ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung have been successfully upheld and developed and his glorious revolutionary history is given steady continuity along with the ever-victorious history of the revolutionary leadership of the WPK, the reporter said.
					
					 Noting that the revolutionary ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung serve as eternal treasures for the WPK and the people of Korea and a fundamental cornerstone for accomplishing the cause of Juche, the reporter called for firmly upholding, preserving and glorifying them and holding him in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He underscored the need to intensify the all-party and all-state general offensive for improving the people's standard of living this year.
					
					 The reporter declared that the Korean people would resolutely smash the anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad, achieve national reconciliation and unity and accomplish the cause of national reunification through the great unity of the nation without fail under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The DPRK will make positive endeavors to ensure regional peace and security, develop the good-neighborly friendly relations with all the countries and progressive people aspiring after independence and make the world independent, holding high the banner of independence, peace and friendship, he concluded. 
					
					 Similar meetings also took place in various provinces, cities and counties that day.

articles.title: Congratulations from Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulations from Russian President
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from D. Medvedev, president of Russia, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun on Tuesday.
					 The message says:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you on the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK, a national holiday.
					
					 Russia remembers the contribution made by Kim Il Sung to the establishment and strengthening of the relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Treaty of Friendship, Good Neighborliness and Cooperation concluded in 2000 serves as the solid foundation for the development of the bilateral relations in the 21st century.
					
					 I am convinced that cooperation between Russia and the DPRK conforms to the interests of the two peoples and it is conducive to ensuring the peace, stability and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia.
					
					 I wish you success in your responsible state affairs and the friendly Korean people happiness, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the Japan-DPRK friendship delegation led by Kaoru Nakamaru, chairperson of the International Affairs Institute for World Peace, in a friendly atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift from IAIWP Chairperson
articles.content:
Gift from IAIWP Chairperson
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the chairperson of the International Affairs Institute for World Peace now on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Chairperson Kaoru Nakamaru on Wednesday.

articles.title: Ecuador Honorary Citizens Awarded
articles.content:
Ecuador Honorary Citizens Awarded
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Certificates of honorary citizens of Esmeraldas City, Esmeraldas Province of Ecuador awarded to the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, were conveyed with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They were separately conveyed to Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, by Luis Banguera Estupinan, acting mayor of Esmeraldas City, Esmeraldas Province of Ecuador, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The certificates say that President Kim Il Sung, anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk and General Secretary Kim Jong Il are the great paragons from whom the people of all the countries struggling for the sovereignty and independence should learn and the city government has decided to confer the title of honorary citizens upon them.

articles.title: Gift from Ecuadorian
articles.content:
Gift from Ecuadorian
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the acting mayor of Esmeraldas City, Esmeraldas Province of Ecuador, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by acting Mayor Luis Banguera Estupinan on Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulations from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The letter was conveyed to an official concerned by Sun Yanfeng, Chinese military, air and naval attache, who is doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secreatry Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from a delegation of the Japan Society for Study of Kimilsungism led by Saito Masahiro and gifts from a delegation of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche led by Chairman N. Bold, a delegation of the Forum for Self-Reliance Studies of Nepal led by Chairman Subash Kaji Shrestha and Antti Sika Aho, vice-chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The floral basket and gifts were conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots laid floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They included a delegation of Koreans in Japan, delegations of the General Association of Koreans in China, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., the Federation of Koreans in Canada and the International United Confederation of Koreans.
					
					 They placed the floral baskets and bouquets before his statue in profound reverence before paying tribute to him.
					
					 On the same day the chief and members of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front laid a floral basket and bowed before the statue.

articles.title: Syrian Charged' Affaires AI Gives Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Charged' Affaires AI Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Souheil Haidar, charge d' affaires ad interim of Syria here, hosted a reception at his embassy on Tuesday on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the independence day of Syria.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam who doubles as chairman of the Korea-Syria Friendship Association and others. 
					
					 Souheil Haidar said in his speech at the reception that the Syrian party, government and people regard the immortal Kim Il Sung as a prominent leader of the world liberation movement and a great leader of the 20th century.
					
					The friendly relations between Syria and the DPRK provided by Hafez Al-Assad and Kim Il Sung are growing stronger under the deep care of President Bashar Al-Assad and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding:
					
					 Many successes have been achieved in the bilateral relations and the two countries have supported and encouraged each other at the United Nations and other international arenas.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said in his speech that Kim Il Sung who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and the human cause of independence is the sun for all people.
					
					 He referred to the fact that thanks to Kim Jong Il, the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward to completion.
					
					 The Korean people have voiced invariable support and solidarity with the Syrian people in their just cause of defending the sovereignty of the country and its territorial integrity and the dignity of the nation and seeking a fair and comprehensive solution to the Mideast issue, he noted, wishing the friendly Syrian people greater success in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: German Parliamentary Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
German Parliamentary Delegation Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of parliamentarians of Bundestag from the coalition ruling parties of Germany led by Peter Gauweiler, member of Bundestag of the Christian Social Union and chairman of the Sub-committee of Policy of Foreign Culture and Education of the Bundestag Foreign Affairs Committee, left here for home Wednesday.
					 While staying in the DPRK, the delegation visited the Changgwang Kindergarten, the Pongsu Church and other places.
					
					 After going round the church, the head of the delegation said that he was amazed to learn that there are churches in the DPRK. 
					
					 He continued:
					
					 I thought I would find no church in the DPRK because I heard a lot of propagandas that there was no church there. But I was enlightened to see such a big church in the DPRK. The propaganda was a sheer lie.
					
					Back home, I will tell a lot of Germans that there are churches in the DPRK. 
					
					 The delegation arrived here on April 12.

articles.title: Condolence Visits Paid to Polish Embassy
articles.content:
Condolence Visits Paid to Polish Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, the Ministry of Foreign Trade, the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Culture, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs visited the Polish embassy here on Tuesday to express condolences over the deaths of Lech Aleksander Kaczynski, president of Poland, and his wife.
					 They observed a moment's silence before the portraits of the deceased, expressing deep condolences over their deaths. 
					
					 They made entries into the mourners' book.

articles.title: DPRK Awards to Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
DPRK Awards to Juche Idea Followers
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Order of DPRK Friendship Second Class was awarded to Secretary General of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea Ramon Jimenez Lopez and Friendship Medals to five Juche idea followers who made contributions to the cause of global independence by conducting positive activities for studying and disseminating the Juche idea.
					 Doctorate of socio-political science of the DPRK was awarded to member of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea Lyne Sinyodyium and member of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development D. Narantuya each. 
					
					 Awarding ceremonies took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: E-Library at Kim Il Sung University Completed
articles.content:
E-Library at Kim Il Sung University Completed
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The newly-built E-Library at Kim Il Sung University was completed.
					 It has several reading halls, information service hall, computer-aided education room, remote-controlled lecture room, multimedia room, general lecture room, academic exchange room, IT research room, etc. equipped with various kinds of the latest electronic devices.
					
					 The construction of the E-library made it possible for the university to play a role as a central seat for remote-controlled education of social and basic sciences and information service to all parts of the country.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the library took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Yong Rim, officials concerned and teachers, employees and students of the university and soldier-builders.
					
					 A report for the completion was made by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly who is member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The soldier-builders worked the miracle of completing the construction of the modern E-library in a matter of nine months, with a single desire to successfully translate into reality the noble intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is working hard to present best things to the rising generation, he said.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il sent to the library his autographic propositions "Let's look at the world with firm foothold on our own land! Prepare to be reliable pillars of the Songun revolution equipped with noble spirit and rich knowledge! Make redoubled efforts to make the world look up to the great party and Kim Il Sung's Korea!" he stressed the need for the students to thoroughly carry them out, regarding them as motto of life and struggle.
					
					 The participants looked round the library.

articles.title: DWUK Commemorates Day of Sun
articles.content:
DWUK Commemorates Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- An event of members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea "Song of the Sun Is Everlasting Thanks to Kim Jong Il" was held at the Arch of Triumph Square on Tuesday to commemorate the Day of the Sun. 
					 The venue of the event was pervaded with boundless longing for President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the union, addressing the event, said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung was a noble life of a great revolutionary and a tender-hearted father as he laid an eternal foundation for realizing all the ideals of the people, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven. 
					
					 Recalling that Kim Il Sung led the DPRK and its people to victory and epoch-making changes, thus building a socialist paradise on this land and enabling the women of the country to lead a worthwhile life, she stressed that these undying exploits would remain shining forever. 
					
					 Reflecting the ardent longing of all the women of the country for Kim Il Sung, they put on the stage poet and song "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", immortal classic masterpiece "Song of Loyalty", chorus "Mine Is Always the Country of Kim Il Sung" and other numbers, emphasizing that the Koreans greeted a new era of the Juche revolution and the heyday of prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation thanks to the day which witnessed the great fortune of the nation. 
					
					 Among those present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and members of the union.

articles.title: Art Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Art Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A fine art exhibition of members of hobby groups of schoolchildren's palaces, schoolchildren's halls and youth halls was held at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace from April 8 to 13.
					 Displayed in the exhibition hall were more than 400 fine art pieces of 15 kinds including Korean paintings, crayon drawings, oil paintings, calligraphic pieces, sculptures and embroideries presented by members of hobby groups who are bringing their hope and talents into full bloom at the extracurricular educational bases across the country.
					
					 The fine art pieces including embroideries "Kimilsungia" and "Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu" reflected the boundless yearning and reverence of the school youth and children for President Kim Il Sung, who is wishing the Juche Korea a bright future even today with the image of the sun.
					
					Also among the exhibits were oil painting "The Road Taken by the General" and poster "Fatherly General Is the Best" showing the ardent feelings of the school youth and children following General Secretary Kim Jong Il in deep reverence, who is paving the bright future of the country.
					
					 There were also exhibits vividly reflecting the stirring reality of the country making leaping progress toward a great prosperous and powerful nation and mind of the schoolchildren growing to be the pillars of the future.

articles.title: Pyongyang in Festive Mood
articles.content:
Pyongyang in Festive Mood
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang has turned out in a festive mood to greet the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, April 15.
					 The streets of the city are bedecked with national flags, red flags, placards emblazoned with "Day of the Sun," "Immortality", "April 15" and other decorations. Public catering establishments are also garbed in festive attire.
					
					 The President's old home in Mangyongdae and other places associated with his revolutionary exploits have been inundated with visitors.
					
					 The 12th Kimilsungia Festival and 2nd April Spring People's Art Festival are going on with a large attendance and such celebrations as meetings to remember the President and pledge loyalty to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, art performances and sports games have been held under the auspices of working people's organizations.
					
					 IAAF-the 23rd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on the 11th amid great concern of sportspersons and enthusiasts. It was participated in by more than 700 male and female athletes from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Ukraine, Kenya and other countries.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest started on the 7th. -

articles.title: US Urged to Promptly Opt for Concluding Peace Treaty
articles.content:
US Urged to Promptly Opt for Concluding Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- It is necessary to direct primary attention to building confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., the main parties concerned with the nuclear issue, in order to put the process of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula back on its track. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 Noting that the world is paying due attention to the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula beset with the biggest danger of a nuclear war in the world, witnessing the conclusion of a new START between Russia and the U.S., the commentary goes on:
					
					 In order to build confidence between the DPRK and the U.S. it is imperative to conclude a peace treaty for putting an end to the state of war, the source of hostile relations, to begin with. The mode of pushing ahead with the denuclearization process before discussing the issue of establishing a peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula ended in failure.
					
					 There is no other alternative than to conclude a peace treaty if the vicious cycle of distrust between the DPRK and the U.S. is to be removed and the denuclearization process is to be pushed forward through confidence-building.
					
					 To conclude a peace treaty is the only reasonable and realistic way for the successful denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is not possible to dissolve distrust for an indefinite period nor is it possible to ensure the smooth progress of talks, much less achieving denuclearization as long as parties concerned are technically at war with their guns leveled at each other.
					
					 Had a durable peace regime been established on the Korean Peninsula earlier, there would not have surfaced the nuclear issue nor the denuclearization issue been raised. The conclusion of a peace treaty would help dissolve the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and give a powerful impetus to the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 There is no doubt that just a start of the negotiations for concluding a peace treaty would provide an effective engine for advancing the process of denuclearization.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes for the denuclearization of the peninsula, it should stop insisting on the unrealistic assertion that the DPRK "dismantle its nuclear weapons first," though belatedly, and promptly respond to concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Having Derailed Tour
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Having Derailed Tour
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Tour should not be allowed under any circumstances to serve the political purpose of confrontation fanatics opposed to reunification, observes Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative group's refusal to resume the tour is a product of its anti-reunification confrontation policy and a criminal action to step up the moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities are playing a poor trick to mislead the mindset of the people, floating the misinformation that the north was to blame for the failure to resume the tour. This clearly indicates that they are abusing the issue of the tour to attain their sinister political aim to realize their anti-reunification confrontation scenario.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are rejecting the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang so adamantly not just to prevent the tour from being resumed but to build a higher barrier of freeze under the pretexts of "incident of a tourist," which accidentally occurred, and "three conditions," stop all the cooperation undertakings, which had been steadily under way between the north and the south since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 The group of Hyon In Thaek is letting loose a spate of vituperation slandering the measure taken by the DPRK but the group committed so many hideous crimes that its artifice is too poor to shirk the responsibility for having scuttled the resumption of the tour.
					
					 The group of traitors will have to pay dearly for its snowballing crimes as it is hell-bent on the anti-reunification confrontation moves in disregard of the demand of the nation and the reunification of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Accused of Begging for "Extended Nuclear Deterrent"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Accused of Begging for "Extended Nuclear Deterrent"
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive was recently reported to have begged the U.S. president for providing "extended nuclear deterrent" to south Korea in a telephone conversation. The puppet minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade was closeted with the U.S. secretary of State over the "proposal for countering north Korea's nukes" the keynote of which is the "provision of extended nuclear deterrent".
					 Mandarins of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense and Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade were reported to have held video meetings with officials concerned of the U.S. Department of Defense and Department of State against this backdrop at which they were given reassurances that the U.S. provision of the above-said deterrent and its "security commitment" remain unchanged.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-mentioned renewed solicitation made by the south Korean puppet group to its American master is an extremely grave development as it hints at a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Its hectic diplomacy aimed at begging for the "provision of extended nuclear deterrent" is nothing but an intolerable treacherous criminal action of driving the tense situation on the peninsula to an unpredictable extreme phase as it discloses its black-hearted intention to unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK at any cost with the backing of foreign forces, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Korean conservative group's above-said diplomacy is designed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever bolster up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the grave situation where the south Korean authorities are working with blood-shot eyes to ignite a nuclear war in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should own full responsibility for pursuing sycophancy towards the U.S. and stepping up the moves for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen, which resulted in driving the inter-Korean ties to the worst crisis and creating the gravest danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war on the peninsula anytime.
					
					 Minju Joson observes in a signed commentary: The "extended nuclear deterrent" which the south Korean conservative group implored the U.S. to provide precisely means nukes. This reveals the group's sinister intention to unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK by use of U.S.-made nukes.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Political parties, government ministries, organizations, institutions and personages from all walks of life in different countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions between April 1 and 10 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among them were the Propaganda and Education Ideological Commission of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association and the National University of Laos, the People's Party, the FUNCINPEC Party and the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia, the National Democratic Party, the Forum for Self-Reliance Studies and the Association for Supporting the Songun Politics of Nepal, the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, and the Foreign Ministry, the Union Solidarity and Development Association, the Yangon City Development Committee and the Football Federation of Myanmar, the vice-prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs, the vice-prime minister and minister of Defence, the minister of Public Security and the secretary of the C.C., the People's Revolutionary Youth Union of Laos and the president of Senate, the deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, the deputy prime minister and minister of Economy a
					
					 nd Finance, the deputy prime minister and minister of Interior, the senior minister and the minister of Information of Cambodia.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany released a statement on April 6 to mark the 17th anniversary of the publication of the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation.
					 "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" set forth by President Kim Il Sung serves as a political programme for strengthening the driving force for Korea's reunification by the unity of the whole nation, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Kim Il Sung devoted great pains and heart and soul to the unity of the whole nation in his lifetime.
					
					 The cause of Korea's reunification desired by him is confronted with serious trials due to the south Korean conservative ruling quarters' vicious anti-DPRK confrontation moves and the war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.
					
					 The joint New Year editorial published by newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league of the DPRK clarified the stand to achieve national reunification as early as possible by the united efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve national reconciliation and cooperation this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Establishing Socialist Cultured Practice in Life to Meet the Need of the Songun Era" was brought out in pamphlet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries.
					 The work, published on February 10 and July 2, Juche 92 (2003), comprehensively clarifies the importance of establishing cultured practice in life to meet the requirement of the Songun era and the tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work was held by the association on April 8.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Commemorated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Commemorated in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued a bulletin on April 8 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin carried articles captioned "His whole life devoted to the country and people", "NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il and the Korean revolution" and "The KPA which has always won victories under the banner of Songun".
					
					 In those articles the bulletin told about the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness, stressing that the whole life of the President praised as the eternal leader by the Korean people was that for the country and the people.
					
					 The bulletin praised Kim Jong Il as a great statesman who is steering the Korean revolution to victory by dint of the Songun idea and single-minded unity based on it and as an iron-willed commander and a genius of creation and construction who opened up a new era of building a thriving nation while defending socialism and reliably protecting the security of the country and the people with Songun.
					
					 Saying that the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung, founder of the KPA, is the history of Songun revolutionary leadership in which he founded the army before anything else and led the revolution in reliance on the powerful military strength, the bulletin stressed that his history of leadership over the army is given steady continuity by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in India, a lecture in the Czech Republic and a reading session in Democratic Congo on March 27 and 29 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					On display in the venues of the events were President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century", General Secretary Kim Jong Il's works and Korean books on the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The secretary general of the Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies and other speakers said that they deem it honor to commemorate the Day of the Sun together with the Korean people and praised Kim Il Sung's noble revolutionary life and undying feats.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo noted that charmed by Kim Il Sung's idea and personality, many revolutionary comrades embarked on the road of the revolution following him and devoted their all to him. The President is a great model of revolutionary comradeship, he stressed.
					
					 He said that today the President's history of comradeship goes on thanks to Kim Jong Il who is identical to the President.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in India.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia el ejercicio militar con motivo del Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia el ejercicio militar con motivo del Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), vio el ejercicio combinado de la Gran Unidad Combinada 567 del EPC efectuado en ocasion del Dia del Sol (dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, el Dirigente subio al mirador donde escucho las explicaciones sobre el plan del ejercicio y presencio el entrenamiento militar.
					
					  Al ver este ejercicio de alto nivel en que se aplicaron exitosamente los originales metodos de combate, evaluo altamente los exitos logrados en la ocasion por todos los uniformados mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos se hayan preparado firmemente en lo politico-ideologico y en lo militar -tecnico para frustrar a tiempo cualquier invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos y defender de modo inexpugnable la patria socialista, y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en fortalecer mas el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					  Los militares del heroico EPC se han preparado como cuerpo de suicidas que ofrendaran con gusto su juventud y vida para el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo y como vanguardias de la revolucion del Songun, apunto y agrego que el EPC crecio ademas como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dispuestas de todos los medios modernos de ataque y defensa.
					
					  Continuo que por contar con ese gran ejercito invencible que continua las tradiciones de la lucha armada antijaponesa, el regimen socialista coreano centrado en las masas populares sera para siempre un baluarte indestructible.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados del EPC defenderan firmemente con las armas la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Ri Yong Mu y O Kuk Ryol, vicepresidentes del CDN de la RPDC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Il Chol, miembro del CDN de la RPDC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC incluyendo los secretarios Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes entre el publico los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios e instituciones centrales y los de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, asi como los comandantes de varias unidades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia subsidios escolares y becas a hijos de coreanos en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia subsidios escolares y becas a hijos de coreanos en Japon 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 98 del natalicio del Presidente           Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) los subsidios escolares y becas calculados en 184 millones 27 mil 390 \ (moneda japonesa) para la educacion nacional democratica de los hijos de los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					El monto de tales fondos enviados por el Presidente y el Dirigente en 156 ocasiones hasta la fecha llega a 46 mil 594 millones 250 mil 390 \.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe el mensaje de felicitacion de Dmitri Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe el mensaje de felicitacion de Dmitri Medvedev 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 13 el Presidente ruso Dmitri Medvedev en ocasion del Dia del Sol (dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  El mensaje senala:
					
					  Envio mis felicitaciones a Usted con motivo de la fiesta nacional, el aniversario 98 de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Rusia recuerda la contribucion del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien establecio y fortalecio las relaciones entre nuestros dos paises.
					
					  El Tratado sobre la Amistad, la Buena Vecindad y la Cooperacion concertado en el ano 2000 sirve de solida base para el desarrollo de las relaciones Rusia-Corea en el siglo XXI.
					
					  Estoy convencido de que la cooperacion mutua entre Rusia y la RPDC conviene a los intereses de ambos pueblos y contribuye a asegurar la paz, la estabilidad y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana  y el resto de la region asiatica.
					
					  Deseo que Usted tenga exitos en sus labores responsables del Estado y que el amistoso pueblo coreano tenga felicidad, paz y prosperidad.

articles.title: Acto central por el 98o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto central por el 98o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Il Sung 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 98o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Asistieron los cuadros del Partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los innovadores laborales y los trabajadores capitalinos, las delegaciones de coreanos y personalidades coreanas, en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los miembros del cuerpo de agregados militares y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El 15 de abril en que nacio el Presidente, fue el dia de gran fortuna nacional, que despunto la aurora de renacimiento nacional en la patria en desgracia, y el dia historico que prometio la buena perspectiva al pueblo coreano y a la humanidad progresista, senala el informante y prosigue: 
					
					El Presidente es el destacado ideologo y teorico que concibio la inmortal idea Juche, el patriota sin igual e invencible y genial comandante de acero que dio origen a la revolucion del Songun bajo la bandera de la idea Juche y salvo y glorifico el destino de la patria y la nacion con las fuerzas armadas al conducir a la victoria la causa de independencia antiimperialista. 
					
					Es el politico no visto en la historia quien fundo el partido y el Estado de tipo jucheano, realizo la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias y preparo el poderoso sujeto de la revolucion. 
					
					El Presidente es el fundador de la Corea socialista y genio en la creacion y construccion, quien al glorificar la historia de la lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion socialista como la de gran auge revolucionario y levantar sobre esta tierra el mas superior socialismo centrado en las masas populares,  creo los cambios del siglo en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					El Presidente dejo abierta la ancha via para lograr la reunificacion de la patria e hizo un aporte imborrable a la causa de verificacion de la independencia en todo el mundo.
					
					Gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la idea y las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente se defienden y se desarrollan de modo brillante y su gloriosa historia revolucionaria continua junto con la trayectoria de invencible direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la revolucion.
					
					La idea y las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente son el tesoro eterno del Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea y al mismo tiempo, la piedra angular para el termino de la causa del Juche. Por lo tanto, hay que defenderlas firmemente y glorificarlas mas y enaltecer para siempre al Presidente como el Sol del Juche.
					
					Este ano, tenemos que desplegar una ofensiva general de todo el partido y todo el Estado para mejorar las condiciones de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Frustraremos rotundamente las maniobras anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas divisionistas en el interior y el exterior del pais para lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y cumplir sin falta la causa de reunificacion de la patria con la gran unidad nacional enarbolando la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Lucharemos activamente por preservar la paz y la seguridad de la region, desarrollar bajo la bandera de independencia, paz y amistad las relaciones de buena vecindad y amistad con todos los paises y los pueblos progresistas, que aspiran a la independencia, y por verificar la independencia en el mundo entero.
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de una personalidad ecuatoriana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de una personalidad ecuatoriana
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera el presidente ocasional del Canton de Esmeraldas, capital de la Provincia homonima de la Republica del Ecuador, Luis Banguera Estupinan, de visita en Corea con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					Luis Banguera Estupinan lo entrego el dia 14 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Ecuador otorga diploma honorifico a tres Generales del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Ecuador otorga diploma honorifico a tres Generales del monte Paektu 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ATCC) -- Los Tres Generales del monte Paektu (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk) recibieron los diplomas de ciudadano honorario que les otorgara el Canton de Esmeraldas, capital de la Provincia homonima de la Republica del Ecuador con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente).
					Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de entrega de dichos diplomas.
					
					El presidente ocasional de susodicho canton, Luis Banguera Estupinan, de visita en Corea,  los entrego a Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero respectivamente.
					
					En los diplomas se lee que considerando que la historia de la humanidad y la memoria colectiva de los pueblos del tercer mundo, que luchan por la independencia y la autodeterminacion, recuerdan como paradigma y ejemplo de valor, abnegacion y coraje a Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung, la Heroina Kim Jong Suk y Su Excelencia Mariscal   Kim Jong Il, el gobierno municipal del Canton Esmeraldas, capital de la Provincia homonima del Ecuador, acuerda otorgarles los diplomas de ciudadano honorario.
